title: Determining the rate law for Br2-NO reaction

content.description: <math alttext="B r 2 gas plus 2 N O gas react to produce 2 N O B r gas " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Br</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NOBr</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: The reaction represented by the equation above has the following proposed mechanism.Step 1: <math alttext="N O gas plus B r 2 gas is in equilibrium with N O B r 2 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Br</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>⇌</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>NOBr</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> (fast equilibrium) Step 2: <math alttext="N O B r 2 gas plus N O gas react to produce 2 N O B r gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NOBr</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mtext>2</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NOBr</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> (slow) Based on the information, which of the following is the initial rate law for the reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of B r 2, times the molar concentration of N O " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Br</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of B r 2, times the molar concentration of N O squared" overflow="scroll"> </math><math> <semantics> <mrow> <mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub> <mrow> <mtext>Br</mtext></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">]</mo><msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGsbGaaeyyai aabshacaqGLbGaeyypa0Jaam4AaiaacUfacaqGcbGaaeOCamaaBaaa leaacaaIYaaabeaakiaac2facaGGBbGaaeOtaiaab+eacaGGDbWaaW baaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@4740@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of B r 2, squared times the molar concentration of N O " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Br</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of B r 2, times the molar concentration of N O squared" overflow="scroll"> </math><math> <semantics> <mrow> <mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub> <mrow> <mtext>Br</mtext></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">]</mo><msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGsbGaaeyyai aabshacaqGLbGaeyypa0Jaam4AaiaacUfacaqGcbGaaeOCamaaBaaa leaacaaIYaaabeaakiaac2facaGGBbGaaeOtaiaab+eacaGGDbWaaW baaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@4740@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
